medical-imaging.title: B.Sc Medical Imaging Technology
medical-imaging.subtitle: Advanced Diagnostic Imaging for Modern Healthcare

overview.title: About the Course
content: The B.Sc. Medical Imaging technology helps students broaden their ruling horizons and walks of life in medical research & development or specialized Research & Diagnostic imagining companies that bring revolutionary diagnostic imaging to the market. Our college has the provision for training students by assisting in procedures such as Conventional Radiography, Digital radiography, Ultrasonography & Doppler imaging, CT scanning MRI, and Ortho-Pan tomogram (OPG) along with doing diagnostic & therapeutic radiological procedures.

Our graduates can step into this expanding world of healthcare nationally and internationally. They can also work as application specialists in medical imaging equipment manufacturing companies and as teachers in educational institutes. In addition, they can pursue higher studies in this field (MSc & PhD).

items.title: Higher Education
items.description: B.Sc. Medical Imaging Technology graduates can pursue master's and doctorate-level specializations in various imaging modalities.

items.title: Healthcare Sector
items.description: Professionals can find roles as diagnostic imaging technology specialists in both public and private healthcare sectors.

items.title: Global Companies
items.description: Graduates may work as application specialists for global healthcare companies such as GE Healthcare and Philips.

items.title: Academia & Research
items.description: Opportunities exist in academia, allowing graduates to teach and engage in research at institutions both within India and internationally.

careers.title: Career Paths
careers.description: There is a wide range of topics within Medical Imaging Technology related to radiodiagnosis and imaging. There are several positions available to graduate students in government and private sectors.

items.title: Imaging Technologist
items.description: Operate advanced imaging equipment and perform diagnostic procedures in hospitals and clinics.

items.title: Application Specialist
items.description: Technical specialists for imaging units in healthcare companies, supporting equipment installation and training.

items.title: Educational Staff
items.description: Teaching positions in higher learning institutions, sharing expertise with future healthcare professionals.

info.title: Award of Degree
info.description: Upon successful completion of the final year examination and internship, the candidate will receive a Bachelor of Science degree in Medical Imaging Technology.

info.title: Internship
info.description: After passing the final university examination, students are eligible to embark on the Compulsory Rotatory Internship, which is a mandatory requirement for obtaining the B.Sc. Medical Imaging Technology degree.

info.title: Clinical Facilities
info.description: Students receive hands-on training in hospital facilities at the Ambalpady Medical Centre, ensuring real-world clinical exposure.

overview.title: About the Course
content: Medical Laboratory Technology is an Allied Health Science specialty concerned with the diagnosis, and treatment of various diseases through the usage of various clinical laboratory tests. As vital members of the healthcare team, medical laboratory professionals play a critical role in giving the information that is needed to give the best health care and treatment to the patients. The fact is that the practice of modern medicine would be impossible without the laboratory test.

scope.title: Scope & Future Prospects
scope.content: Medical laboratory professionals have an unlimited choice of working in hospitals, clinics, nursing homes, public health facilities, and commercial laboratories as Laboratory technologists. And also, educators in educational institutions. Higher education in the form of M.Sc. and PhD is available in this field as well.

sections.title: Clinical Laboratory Training
sections.description: The students are well trained in the various clinical laboratories which include:
list: Clinical Microbiology (Bacteriology, Mycology, Virology, and Parasitology)

sections.title: Advanced Equipment & Technologies
sections.description: These Laboratories are well equipped with the most sophisticated instruments and undergraduate students are getting training on advanced technologies like auto analysers, Immunofluorescence, ELISA, Western blot, PCR, Hormonal Analysis, etc.

sections.title: Department Laboratories
sections.description: In addition to this, there is an Analytical Laboratory and a Multi-purpose laboratory in the Department itself to conduct the practicals for students. These labs are equipped with enough Microscopes, Centrifuges, Spectrophotometers, Weighing Balance, Water baths, Incubators, Hot air ovens, pH meters, etc., and are spacious and student-friendly for instruction and independent practice.

info.title: Award of Degree
info.description: Upon successful completion of the final year examination and internship, the candidate will receive a Bachelor of Science degree in Medical Laboratory Technology.

info.title: Internship
info.description: After passing the final university examination, students are eligible to embark on the Compulsory Rotatory Internship, which is a mandatory requirement for obtaining the B.Sc. Medical Laboratory Technology degree.

anaesthesia.title: B.Sc Anaesthesia and Operation Theatre Technology
anaesthesia.subtitle: Critical Care Excellence in Modern Surgery

overview.title: About the Course
content: In the current healthcare industry, Anaesthesia & Operation Theatre Technology is designed to meet the requirements of Anaesthesia & OT technologists. The focus of the program is to train the students to work under anaesthesiologists in administrating and monitoring Anaesthesia during surgical procedures. A candidate in this program will become a member of a multidisciplinary team in operating rooms where they prepare and maintain operating rooms, assist anaesthesiologists and surgeons during the preoperative to postoperative period, and provide recovery room support to patients.

items.title: Jobs in Teaching and Education Institutes

careers.title: Career Paths
careers.description: After completing a B.Sc. in Anaesthesia and Operation Theatre Technology, you can pursue a variety of career options in the field of healthcare.

items.title: Anaesthesia Technologist
items.description: Assist anaesthesiologists in hospitals and surgical centers.

items.title: Operating Room Technologist
items.description: Prepare and maintain OTs, and assist surgical teams.

items.title: Critical Care Technologist
items.description: Work in ICUs and monitor post-surgical patients.

items.title: Surgical Technologist
items.description: Assist surgeons, sterilize instruments, and ensure asepsis.

items.title: Pain Management Technologist
items.description: Support pain procedures like epidurals and nerve blocks.

items.title: Teaching & Education
items.description: Become an instructor in Anaesthesia and OT technology.

items.title: Research & Development
items.description: Innovate in surgical and Anaesthesia technology.

items.title: International Careers
items.description: Work abroad in expanding healthcare sectors.

sections.title: Clinical Training
sections.description: Clinical training forms a core part of the program, providing hands-on experience in hospital settings.

sections.title: Key Components of Training
list: Pre-Operative Phase: Patient preparation, identifying surgical risks, and Anaesthesia planning.
Intra-Operative Phase: Monitoring patient vitals, assisting with Anaesthesia adjustments, and troubleshooting equipment.
Post-Operative Phase: Managing recovery, monitoring vital signs, and managing complications like delayed awakening.

sections.title: Internship Rotations
list: Operation theatres for various specialties (e.g., cardiac, orthopaedic, general surgery).
Intensive Care Units (ICUs) for ventilator management and patient monitoring.
Emergency departments for trauma management and resuscitation.

info.title: Award of Degree
info.description: Upon successful completion of the final year examination and internship, the candidate will receive a Bachelor of Science degree in Anaesthesia and Operation Theatre Technology.

info.title: Internship
info.description: After passing the final university examination, students are eligible to embark on the Compulsory Rotatory Internship, which is a mandatory requirement for obtaining the B.Sc. Anaesthesia and Operation Theatre Technology degree.

bsc-nursing.title: Bachelor of Science in Nursing
bsc-nursing.subtitle: Build Your Career in Compassionate Healthcare

overview.title: B.Sc Nursing
content: A comprehensive 4-year undergraduate program designed to develop skilled, compassionate, and competent nursing professionals ready to serve in diverse healthcare settings.

details.affiliation: Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences (RGUHS), Bengaluru
details.recognition: Rajiv Gandhi University of Health sciences , Karnataka State Nursing Council and Government of Karnataka
details.qualification: 10+2 (Science stream with Physics, Chemistry, and Biology)

eligibility.title: Eligibility Criteria
items: Candidates must have completed 10+2 or equivalent examination in Science stream
Mandatory subjects: Physics, Chemistry, and Biology
Minimum aggregate marks: 45% (40% for reserved categories)
Age criteria as per KSNC and RGUHS norms
Medical fitness certificate required at the time of admission
Proficiency in English language (medium of instruction)

items.title: Comprehensive Curriculum
items.description: Theory, practicals, and clinical exposure combining academic excellence with hands-on training.

items.title: Experienced Faculty
items.description: Learn from qualified and dedicated nursing educators with extensive clinical experience.

items.title: Well-Equipped Laboratories
items.description: State-of-the-art nursing labs with modern equipment for practical skill development.

items.title: Hospital Postings
items.description: Regular clinical rotations in affiliated multi-specialty hospitals for real-world exposure.

items.title: Patient Care Focus
items.description: Strong emphasis on ethics, compassionate patient care, and professional conduct.

items.title: Evidence-Based Practice
items.description: Training in research, critical thinking, leadership, and evidence-based nursing practice.
